backend/main.mo: Stores contact messages in a Motoko canister and provides methods to submit and retrieve them.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Documentation outlining the backend–frontend–runtime deployment flow and diagnostic guidelines.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Instructions for embedding the static 3D cafe build into WordPress Elementor and its capabilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring 3D scene, overlay panels, top navigation, theming, and deployment error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: Layout wrapper providing a textured, blurred, framed container for UI elements.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Generic panel container with header, close button, and scrollable content inside a framed surface.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button with tooltip for reopening the onboarding overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, seating layout toggle, and buttons to open primary panels.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Deploym: Displays a modal for deployment or startup errors with summaries, technical details, and diagnostics copy support.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: Provides a dialog explaining movement and interaction instructions for first‑time users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithErrorHand: Enhanced actor hook that logs errors, exposes error state, and supports manual retry attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppViewport.ts: Tracks visual viewport height and sets a CSS variable to prevent layout shifts on mobile.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Manages a localStorage‑based flag to determine and dismiss first‑visit onboarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages with diagnostics and validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, safe-area utilities, and base layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: Implements a side sheet showing static information about the cafe with icons and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and backend submission plus a messages section.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: Provides WordPress export instructions and a download link for a static package.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Displays menu categories using tabs and lists items with prices and descriptions.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Sets up the 3D cafe scene with basic lighting, fallback room, navigation, and render/error callbacks.
frontend/src/scene/CanvasMountErrorBound: Error boundary that captures and reports mount-time WebGL canvas errors.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeCharac: Deprecated aggregator component that now mounts no characters.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeDogs.t: Places two static dog characters in predefined cafe positions.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeHumans: Places three static human characters with fixed poses and colors in the cafe scene.
frontend/src/scene/characters/characterM: Defines color palettes and memoized material helpers for characters to reduce allocations.
frontend/src/scene/characters/DogCharact: Builds a static low‑poly dog using simple geometries and shared materials.
frontend/src/scene/characters/HumanChara: Builds a static low‑poly human with configurable colors and seated/standing poses.
frontend/src/scene/components/MenuBoardF: Renders a neon-style emissive frame outline using a ShapeGeometry border.
frontend/src/scene/components/NeonCanvas: Generates a canvas-based neon‑glow text texture for use on a plane mesh.
frontend/src/scene/components/WallFrameL: Creates a high‑resolution canvas text texture for wall-mounted labels with padding and surface offset.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: React hook adding keyboard and pointer-based first-person navigation with touch detection and pointer lock support.
frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafe: Fallback 3D café room rendering walls, floor, counter, and minimal props with contour textures and conditional seating.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Full café environment with physics floor, textured walls, contour overlays, furniture, and optional seating based on layout.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Defines reusable 3D furniture components including counter, table, and wooden chair with contour-textured surfaces.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds decorative café props like espresso machine, grinder, pastry case, and neon-accented menu board with contour textures.
frontend/src/scene/environment/Commercia: Renders a detailed commercial espresso machine model using Three.js meshes, including group heads, steam wands, and drip tray.
frontend/src/scene/HomeCafeCanvas.tsx: Manages WebGL checks, error handling, loading state, and mounts the 3D cafe scene with fallback overlays.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useContourTextu: Loads and configures a contour texture and creates floor, wall, and furniture variants with repeat and filtering settings.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: Asynchronously loads a texture without blocking rendering and logs success or failure with optional error callbacks.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useSceneStartup: Provides a watchdog timer that triggers a callback if a scene fails to render within a timeout, with reset and cancel support.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useWallMapTextu: Loads and configures a wall map texture with repeat, filtering, and anisotropy settings for crisp rendering.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Controls a door mesh that opens or closes based on the camera’s distance, animating rotation smoothly.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Implements an inspectable prop that rotates on drag and shows an HTML hint while inspecting.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Empty placeholder file for interaction-related logic.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Renders interactive floating props (card, cup, sign) with hover scaling, click feedback, and optional label text.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Displays rotating POI markers with hover and dwell detection, triggering UI panel activation when looked at or clicked.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Defines a registry of POIs with positions, labels, actions, and highlight colors for use in interaction components.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Detects when the camera enters defined proximity zones and shows an overlay with an action button for each zone.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/ScenePan: Empty placeholder file for scene panel prop logic.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Defines factory functions for creating various Three.js materials and exports preset contour color values.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that tracks render errors and resets on retry via resetKey.
frontend/src/scene/ui/NonWebGLFallback.t: Displays a non-blocking UI fallback when WebGL is unavailable, including layout info, technical details, and a re-check button.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneDegradedOverl: Shows an overlay warning that only a basic room loaded and offers a retry option.
Presents a detailed error overlay for scene load failures with optional diagnostics and retry support.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: Displays a loading overlay that switches to a degraded warning after a timeout and can trigger retries.
frontend/src/scene/ui/WebGLCheckingOverl: Shows a minimal overlay indicating that WebGL support is being checked.
frontend/src/scene/utils/sceneDiagnostic: Implements diagnostic logging utilities, types, and helpers for scene load failures and statuses.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglFailureHeu: Provides heuristics to classify WebGL-related errors and generate readable fallback reasons.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL support, determines context version, and reports issues or warnings.
frontend/src/state/roomLayoutStore.ts: Zustand store managing the current room layout variant and toggling between variants.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store for tracking which UI panel is active.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Defines motion timing, easing presets, and a helper to build transition strings.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Exports design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Provides utilities for logging deployment errors with contextual details and remediation hints across backend, frontend, and runtime steps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and state information for the Contour Cafe 3D project.
